title: DO IT OR DEPART, JAYALALITHAA TELLS MANMOHAN SINGH!
content: J. Jayalalithaa, leader of the Anaitha India Anna Dravis Munnethra Kalaham (AIADMK) party has demanded that Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh step down if he is not capable of finding a solution to end the mid sea attacks on Indian fishermen, says the Times of India. Jayalaithaa had said that the reason for continuing attacks…
